name: Consumables
description: **Alcoholic:** Acts like a poison and is able to mask poisons that are mixed with it. If a creature consumes a number of drinks with the *Alcoholic* trait above their Constitution modifier, each new drink will require a DC 13 Constitution save or gain 1 level of the Exhausted condition which can progress with further consumption. All levels of Exhaustion gained this way end after 10 hours.

equipment.name: Dekatrian Wine (1 bottle)
equipment.body: Dekatrian Wine is one of the most famous drinks in the world and is the main export of Sweetrose, a city on the eastern border of Dekatreis. Upon drinking a glass of Dekatrian Wine, you gain advantage on skill checks made with Charsima or Strength for the next minute.
